application

Class Application

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.Application
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Application
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Author:
    Simon Valcarcel, Blanca Martin This class is the main class, which makes reference to the application
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
